title: Full Stack Web Developer
tagLine: From idea to production â€” I build reliable web apps end-to-end.
description: I'm a full stack developer with a Django and React focus. I love solving complex problems and building apps that scale. When I'm not coding, I mentor aspiring devs and teach CS in high school classrooms.

description.short: Microservice-based app for managing resort bookings.
description.detailed: Built with FastAPI, DynamoDB, and AWS Cognito, this app allows customers to book rooms, admins to manage staff and resorts, and employees to check guests in/out. Features include JWT-based auth, real-time availability, and payment integration with Stripe.

description.short: A teacher dashboard to track attendance and assignments.
description.detailed: Developed using Django REST and React, this tool helps teachers track student attendance, assignments, and grades in real time. Includes CSV export, chart insights, and role-based access control.
